name: Esker
subtitle: The Illusion Gambler
description: The most dangerous man in the secret gambling world. He has a strange ability to read people's minds. As soon as one gets distracted by the roll of his dice, the game's as good as lost.
story: Born with the spirit of a wandering artist, Esker was a star magician of the Stardust, a wandering theater troupe, until he was framed by Prime Minister El Moriham of Orvelia and disappeared. Just when everyone started forgetting about him, he came out to the world as one of the most dangerous gamblers in the secret gambling world. 'The Illusion Gambler.' That was what his challengers called him, trembling in fear. The gamblers that played with him all described him in a similar manner. As soon as they faced Esker's unique laughter, his soft voice, and his empty eyes, they all felt nauseated by the suspicion that the man in the front was reading their every move.
like: Mumbo Jumbo Runic Cube, Piano Concerto No. 7 of Hayedden, Silver Catfish Filet spiced with 4 drops of lemon juice.
dislike: Fishing, earthworms, con artists, everything that's spicy.

inn.idle: Shh! Don't tell anyone that you saw me.

recruit.greet: Do you want to play? I might let you win a game of two.
talk: Keep your eyes open and see. As soon as I throw this dice, a world of my creation will unfold in front of you.
Uh-oh. I know what the next roll is going to be. You lose the moment you let your opponent read your mind.
Feeling angry that I keep winning? Come on, I'll let you win next time.

affinity.greet: Hahaha, you've gotten better! How about joining me and earning some real money?
talk: That Lucias is one stubborn idiot. Don't ever tell him that I'm here. Argh, thinking about running into him already makes me feel tired...
The secret gambling house? Hmph, you could never imagine. They won't let you sit at the table unless you bet Vampire blood. Come on, don't cry. I'm just messing with you.
affinity.gift: Forget the gift and let's grab dinner. Silver Catfish Filet spiced up with lemon juice will be perfect.

relationship.greet: My game won't end unless my revenge is complete. I don't care if it ruins me or not. The dice will keep rolling.
talk: I used to fish smelts with him when we were young... Well, I never liked it, anyway. I hated baiting the hook with those gross earthworms.
I would teach Ophelia how to shuffle cards after the performance.
When am I going back to Stardust? Well... I'll think about it if you're coming to see the performance.

uw.story: A pair dice once used by Hexipolia, the Wandering Illusion Clown. He was a renowned mage and artist in ancient times who traveled all across the continent to give joy to people and help them forget their troubles. His performance was a solace and hope to people living in confusing times, and they loved him to the extent that they made the Moon of Hexipolia after he passed away in honor of his noble spirit. However, the mentally demanding nature of Hexipolia's craft slowly gnawed into his soul, making him suffer from loneliness and depression. He wanted to give up on his natural gift, but the shadow cast upon people was just too deep; he knew too well what his performances meant to his audience. It was his destiny to amuse people. Lu Etrona Dice is what he made to amuse himself during his painful journey of entertainment. He condensed his Mana into the dice and gave it the power to form a dimensional illusion. When rolled, the dice opened up an imaginary world where Hexipolia could find some peace. The dice was passed down to the descendants of his life-long pursuit for clowning, but it disappeared when the ancient civilization collapsed. And now, the dice is in the hands of a man called the Illusion Gambler. Being used in a completely different way, against its maker's intentions... It is said that the dice appeared in Esker's hands with blinding lights when he desperately wanted to escape this world.

ut.story: A toy cube that Esker used to play with Ophelia when she was feeling down. The Cube lets out a gleaming light when the Runic letters are put together, and starts playing a beautiful melody when completely solved. Ophelia would often feel depressed that she didn't know what the man of her destiny she met in her dreams looked like. In such cases, Esker would, just as he did to calm his sister down, take this cube out and let her watch him solve the cube.

ut.story: A chess piece that belonged to Esker's performance partner in Stardust. When the magic show was over, the duo would play chess and talk about their performance earlier. The day that the 'incident' happened and Esker decided to leave the troupe, no one but his partner knew what he had in mind. Handing this chess piece in Esker's hands, he told Esker not to forget Stardust and to come back when he could.

ut.story: A fishing rod for kids that Esker's childhood friend gave him as a present. There was an annoying boy living in a town that Stardust would visit during annual tours. The boy, Lucias, would read the boring bible to Esker and frighten him with stag beetles. Esker hated him for always smiling like an idiot at first, but they soon became close friends. When Stardust came to visit Lucias's town on another tour, the two exchanged a token of friendship, and this fishing rod was what Lucias gave Esker. Since then, Esker had to go fishing with Lucias every time he would come to the town.
